DOC.brief_summary: The specific objective study : - Evaluate quantify colorimetric change young permanent anterior teeth ; - Compare efficiency efficacy three gel use self-administered home whitening counter whiten strip ; - Analyze increase dental sensitivity adolescent patient submit home whiten 6 % 7.5 % hydrogen peroxide without addition calcium ( whiten strip ) ; - Assess sensitivity , comfort acceptance whiten strip patient ; - Assess patient satisfaction method material use home whitening .
DOC.detailed_description: The aim propose controlled clinical trial ass colorimetric change increase dental sensitivity adolescent patient submit tooth whiten 6 % 7.5 % hydrogen peroxide use home kit whiten strip . Adolescents age 12 20 year allocate different group base treatment ( n = 16 per group ) : 1 ) placebo ; 2 ) 6.0 % hydrogen peroxide ( White Class calcium - FGM ) ; 3 ) 7.5 % hydrogen peroxide ( White Class calcium - FGM ) ; 4 ) 7.5 % hydrogen peroxide ( Oral B 3D White - Oral-B ) . After whiten procedure , participant evaluate use visual analogue scale tooth sensitivity digital spectrophotometry measurement change color .
DOC.criteria: Age 12 20 year ; diagnosis alter color maxillary mandibular anterior teeth initial color equivalent A2 Vita scale ( Vita Zahnfabrik ) ; sign statement inform consent Dental anomaly ( malformation , carious lesion , fracture ) ; presence least four maxillary and/or mandibular anterior teeth ; know adverse reaction peroxide ; use whiten agent ( administer dental office home ) previous year ; currently undergo orthodontic treatment , orthopedic treatment jaws psychological treatment ; use medication alter color teeth , ferrous sulfate .
